animeTitle: Digimon Xros Wars: Aku no Death General to Nanatsu no Oukoku (Dub)
otherNames: Digimon Fusion, デジモンクロスウォーズ～悪のデスジェネラルと七つの王国～, Digimon Xros Wars: The Evil Death Generals and the Seven Kingdoms
synopsis: Returning to the Digital World, Taiki and Shoutmon learn that the Bagra Army has taken it over and reformatted the world to have Seven Kingdoms, each ruled by a general.
